.. _`Resources`:

Resources
=========
This section describes classes and functions private to CMPT221 Course Labs. It is intended to document how the application works

labs.lab-1
----------
Initialization of Repository through GitHub and VSCode

labs.lab-2
----------
Virtual Environment (venv) Setup and Requirements Installation

labs.lab-3
----------
Postgres and SQLAlchemy Setup to Initialize Database

labs.lab-4
----------
Additional ORM and Raw SQL Queries for Database

labs.lab-5
----------
Purposely Bad GUI created with HTML + CSS + JS

labs.lab-6
----------
Signup And Login Form for User Page that connects to User table in the Database

labs.lab-7
----------
Additional Data Sanitization and Error Logging 

labs.lab-8
----------
Python Unit Tests for Flask Routing and Data Sanitization

labs.lab-9
----------
Complete Sphinx Documentation for CMPT221 Course Labs
